import{createStore,compose,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import rootReducer from'../reducers';import createSagaMiddleware from'redux-saga';import rootSaga from'../sagas';import createApiAuthMiddle from"./middlewares";//kiểm tra môi trường web là dev và tích hợp redux_dev_tool
var composeEnhencers=process.env.NODE_ENV!=='production'&&typeof window==='object'&&window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__?window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__({shouldNotReload:false}):compose;//tạo saga-middleware
var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();var configureStore=function configureStore(){//chứa các middleware
var middlewares=[sagaMiddleware,createApiAuthMiddle];var enhancers=[applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middlewares)];var store=createStore(rootReducer,composeEnhencers.apply(void 0,enhancers));sagaMiddleware.run(rootSaga);return store;};export default configureStore;
